plot: Jimmy discovers the Sandpiper Retirement Home has been scamming his elderly clients, and prepares to take legal action.

With assistance from his elder clients, Jimmy comes to discover that the Sandpiper Retirement Home has been financially scamming the elders without their knowledge. Now with the help of his brother Chuck, Jimmy takes the case to court in hopes of getting another break as well as helping his clients.—Johnny Carrot

While preparing a will for one of his clients at the Sandpiper Crossing retirement home, Jimmy realizes that they have been seriously overcharging the residents for basic services. He consults his brother Chuck who agrees that if the charges are persistent and widespread, it amounts to fraud and might succeed as a class action suit. Chuck is fully involved in the case and with his mind on work, walks outside without any apparent ill effect. Meanwhile, Mike's daughter-in-law Stacey needs his advice on what to do with the money she found.—garykmcd
